anya-e0103n11:117_1: labbhamānāpi avakaṁsato sabbapariyantime utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānesu suddhaṭṭhake, kammajesu
anya-e0103n11:117_2: jīvitanavaketi ekekasmiṁ suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi padesena avinibbhuttā visuṁ visuṁ
anya-e0103n11:117_3: aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya. Yattha hi tissannaṁ dhātūnaṁ patiṭṭhāvasena pathavī, tattheva
anya-e0103n11:117_4: tassā ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇavasena itarā. Esa nayo sesāsupi.
anya-e0103n11:118_0: 354.Purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā aññamaññanti adhippāyo. Ettha ca nanu pathaviyāpi
anya-e0103n11:118_1: lahubhāvo atthi. Tathā hi sā “kakkhaḷaṁ mudukaṁ saṇhaṁ pharusaṁ garukaṁ lahuka”nti
anya-e0103n11:118_2: niddiṭṭhā, āpepi lahubhāvo labbhatevāti? Na, nippariyāyagarubhāvassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n11:118_3: Garubhāvo eva hi pathavīdhātuyā garutaraṁ upādāya lahubhāvoti pariyāyena vutto sītabhāvo
anya-e0103n11:118_4: viya tejodhātuyā. Yadi evaṁ rūpassa lahutāti kathaṁ? Ayampi vuttanayā eva lahutākāraṁ
anya-e0103n11:118_5: upādāya labbhanato. Na hi paricchedavikāralakkhaṇāni paramatthato labbhanti nipphannarūpānaṁ
anya-e0103n11:118_6: avatthāvisesasabhāvato. Tasmā paramatthasiddhaṁ garubhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “purimā
anya-e0103n11:118_7: dve garukattā sabhāgā”ti. “Tathā”ti padena “sabhāgā”ti imamatthaṁ upasaṁharati. “Dve”ti
anya-e0103n11:118_8: pana idaṁ yathā “purimā”ti ettha, evaṁ “pacchimā”ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:118_9: Visabhāgā garukalahukabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Yathā ca garukalahukabhāvehi, evaṁ peyyabhāvāpeyyabhāvehi
anya-e0103n11:119_1: viññattiindriyānanti cakkhādīnaṁ channaṁ viññāṇavatthūnaṁ, dvinnaṁ viññattīnaṁ, itthipurisindriyajīvitindriyānañca.
anya-e0103n11:119_2: Ye pana “viññāṇavatthūti hadayavatthu gahita”nti vadanti, tesaṁ indriya-ggahaṇena
anya-e0103n11:119_3: aṭṭhannampi rūpindriyānaṁ gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ. “Vuttaviparītappakārā”ti idaṁ bāhirānaṁ
anya-e0103n11:119_4: dhātūnaṁ yathā sabbaso viññāṇavatthuviññattiindriyānaṁ anissayatā ca iriyāpathaviraho
anya-e0103n11:119_5: ca vuttavipariyāyo, evaṁ catusamuṭṭhānatāpīti katvā vuttaṁ, na lakkhaṇarūpassa viya
anya-e0103n11:119_6: kutocipi samuṭṭhānassa abhāvato utusamuṭṭhānatāya tāsaṁ. Lahutādinissayatāpi ajjhattikānaṁ
anya-e0103n11:119_7: dhātūnaṁ vattabbā, na vā vattabbā. Viññatti-ggahaṇaṁ hi lakkhaṇanti.
anya-e0103n11:120: 356.Itarāhīti āpotejovāyudhātūhi. Ekasaṅgahāti sajātisaṅgahena ekasaṅgahā. Samānajātiyānaṁ hi saṅgaho sahajātisaṅgaho. Tenāha “samuṭṭhānanānattābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0103n11:121_0: 357.Tiṇṇaṁmahābhūtānaṁ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotīti yehi mahābhūtehi sampiṇḍanavasena
anya-e0103n11:121_1: saṅgahitā, paripācanavasena anupālitā, samudīraṇavasena vitthambhitā ca, tesaṁ attanā
anya-e0103n11:121_2: sahajātānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ patiṭṭhā hutvā tato eva sandhāraṇavasena avassayo
anya-e0103n11:121_3: hoti, vuttanayena vā patiṭṭhā hutvā sahajātādivasena paccayo hotīti. Esa nayo sesāsupi.
anya-e0103n11:122_0: 358. Yadipi aññamaññaābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti heṭṭhā dhātūnaṁ asamannāhāratā
anya-e0103n11:122_1: dassitā eva, athāpi imināva nayena visuṁ kammaṭṭhānapariggaho kātabboti dassento
anya-e0103n11:122_2: “pathavīdhātu cetthā”tiādimāha. Tattha pathavīdhātu cetthāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho,
anya-e0103n11:122_3: tena ayampi eko manasikārappakāroti dīpeti. Etthāti etāsu dhātūsu. Ahaṁ “pathavīdhātū”ti
anya-e0103n11:122_4: vā “paccayo homī”ti vā na jānātīti attani viya attano kicce ca ābhogābhāvaṁ dassetvā
anya-e0103n11:122_5: upakārakassa viya upakattabbānampi ābhogābhāvaṁ dassetuṁ “itarānipī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:122_6: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu dhātūsu, tatthāpi attakiccupakattabbabhedesu sabbesu.
anya-e0103n11:123_1: hi iminā pathavīādīnaṁ aññāsādhāraṇo patiṭṭhābhāvādinā sesabhūtattayassa paccayabhāvo
anya-e0103n11:123_2: vutto. Idha pana yehi dhammehi pathavīādīnaṁ uppatti, tesaṁ pathavīādīnañca anavasesato
anya-e0103n11:123_3: paccayabhāvavibhāgo vuccatīti ayaṁ imesaṁ dvinnaṁ ākārānaṁ viseso. Kammanti kusalākusalaṁ
anya-e0103n11:123_4: rūpuppādakaṁ kammaṁ. Cittanti yaṁ kiñci rūpuppādakaṁ cittaṁ. Āhāroti ajjhattiko rūpuppādako
anya-e0103n11:123_5: āhāro. Utūti yo koci utu, atthato tejodhātu. Kammamevāti avadhāraṇaṁ samuṭṭhānasaṅkarābhāvadassanatthaṁ,
anya-e0103n11:123_6: tena akammajānampi kesañci kammassa pariyāyapaccayabhāvo dīpito hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati
anya-e0103n11:123_8: paccayena bhavitabbanti? Bhavitabbaṁ, so pana kammagatikovāti paṭiyogīnivattanatthaṁ
anya-e0103n11:123_9: avadhāraṇaṁ kataṁ, tenāha “na cittādayo”ti. Cittādisamuṭṭhānānanti etthāpi ayamattho
anya-e0103n11:123_10: yathārahaṁ vattabbo. Itareti cittādito aññe. Janakapaccayoti samuṭṭhāpakataṁ sandhāya
anya-e0103n11:123_11: vuttaṁ, paccayo pana kammapaccayova. Vuttaṁ hi “kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ
anya-e0103n11:124_0: Sesānanti cittādisamuṭṭhānānaṁ. Pariyāyato upanissayapaccayo hotīti paṭṭhāne arūpānaṁyeva
anya-e0103n11:124_1: upanissayapaccayassa āgatattā nippariyāyena rūpadhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayo natthi.
anya-e0103n11:124_2: Sutte pana “puggalaṁ upanissāya vanasaṇḍaṁ upanissāyā”ti vacanato suttantikapariyāyena
anya-e0103n11:124_3: vinā abhāvo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo. Cittaṁ janakapaccayo hotīti sahajātanissayāhārādivasena
anya-e0103n11:124_4: paccayo hontaṁ cittaṁ samuṭṭhāpakataṁ upādāya “janakapaccayo hotī”ti vuttaṁ. Āhārautūsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n11:125_0: Evaṁ kammādīnaṁ paccayadhammānaṁ vasena dhātūsu paccayavibhāgaṁ dassetvā idāni taṁsamuṭṭhānānaṁ
anya-e0103n11:125_1: dhātūnampi vasena paccayavibhāgaṁ dassento paṭhamaṁ tāva “kammasamuṭṭhānaṁ mahābhūta”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n11:125_2: uddisitvā puna “tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātū”tiādinā niddisati. Tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā
anya-e0103n11:125_3: pathavīdhātūti “kammasamuṭṭhānaṁ mahābhūta”nti ettha sāmaññato vuttā kammajapathavīdhātu.
anya-e0103n11:125_4: Kammasamuṭṭhānānaṁ itarāsanti kammajānaṁ āpodhātuādīnaṁ tissannaṁ dhātūnaṁ sahuppattiyā
anya-e0103n11:125_5: attano upakārakānaṁ tāsaṁ upakārakato, ādhārabhāvato, uppādato yāva bhaṅgādharaṇato,
anya-e0103n11:125_7: paccayo hoti, hontī ca kammaṁ viya attano, tāsañca na janakavasena paccayo hoti asamuṭṭhāpakattā
anya-e0103n11:125_8: tāsaṁ. Kāmañcettha nissayapaccaya-ggahaṇeneva patiṭṭhābhāvo saṅgahito, pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0103n11:125_9: pana anaññasādhāraṇakiccaṁ sahajātānaṁ patiṭṭhābhāvoti imaṁ visesaṁ dassetuṁ “patiṭṭhāvasena
anya-e0103n11:125_10: cā”ti visuṁ katvā vuttaṁ. Ābandhanavasena cātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tisantatimahābhūtānanti
anya-e0103n11:125_11: utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānānaṁ catumahābhūtānaṁ aññamaññaṁ avokiṇṇānaṁ, avicchedena pavattiṁ
anya-e0103n11:125_12: upādāya santatīti santatiggahaṇaṁ. Pathavīdhātuyā patiṭṭhābhāvo nāma sahajātānaṁ
anya-e0103n11:125_13: dhammānaṁyevāti āha “na patiṭṭhāvasenā”ti. Na ābandhanavasenātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n11:125_15: itarāsa”ntiādīsu sukaro tantinayo netunti “cittaāhāra…pe… eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
anya-e0103n11:126_0: Sahajātādipaccayavasappavattāsu ca panāti ettha ca-saddo samuccayattho, pana-saddo
anya-e0103n11:126_1: visesattho, tadubhayena ca yathāvuttasahajātādipaccayehi pavattamānā dhātuyo iminā
anya-e0103n11:127_0: Idāni taṁ visesaṁ dassetuṁ “ekaṁ paṭiccā”tigāthamāha. Tattha ekaṁ dhātuṁ paṭicca
anya-e0103n11:127_1: tisso dhātuyo catudhā sampavattanti, tisso dhātuyo paṭicca ekāva dhātu catudhā sampavattati,
anya-e0103n11:127_2: dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve dhātuyo chadhā sampavattantīti yojanā. Attho pana pathavīādīsu
anya-e0103n11:127_3: ekekissā paccayabhāve itarāsaṁ tissannaṁ tissannaṁ paccayuppannatāti ayameko catukko,
anya-e0103n11:127_4: tissannaṁ tissannaṁ paccayabhāve itarāya ekekissā paccayuppannatāti ayamaparo catukko,
anya-e0103n11:127_5: paṭhamadutiyā, tatiyacatutthā, paṭhamatatiyā, dutiyacatutthā, paṭhamacatutthā, dutiyatatiyāti
anya-e0103n11:127_6: imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ dvinnaṁ paccayabhāve tattha tattha itarāsaṁ dvinnaṁ dvinnaṁ paccayuppannatāti
anya-e0103n11:127_7: ayameko chakko. Evaṁ paccayabhāvena catudhā, chadhā ca pavattamānānaṁ ekakadvikatikavasena
anya-e0103n11:127_8: tikadukaekakavasena ca yathākkamaṁ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāgo veditabbo. Ayañca
anya-e0103n11:127_10: veditabbo. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ paṭiccavāre “ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā,
anya-e0103n11:127_11: tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ, dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0103n11:128_1: daṭṭhabbo. Uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuvasena sijjhanato.
anya-e0103n11:128_2: Sāvāti pathavīdhātuyeva. Āpodhātuyā anugatā āpodhātuyā tattha appadhānabhāvaṁ, pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0103n11:128_3: ca padhānabhāvanti patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi sātisayakiccattā tassā patiṭṭhāpanassa
anya-e0103n11:128_4: pādaṭṭhapanassa paccayo hotīti sambandho. Avakkhepanassāti adhonikkhipanassa. Tattha
anya-e0103n11:128_5: ca garutarasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā sātisayo byāpāroti āha “pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātū”ti.
anya-e0103n11:128_6: Tathā uddhaṅgatikā tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo vutto. Tiriyaṁ
anya-e0103n11:128_7: gatikāya vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo
anya-e0103n11:128_8: gahito. Tattha ṭhitaṭṭhānato abhimukhaṁ pādassa haraṇaṁ atiharaṇaṁ, purato haraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:128_9: Tato thokaṁ vītikkamma haraṇaṁ vītiharaṇaṁ, passato haraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:129_0: Ekekena mukhenāti “patthaṭattā pathavī”tiādinā vibhattesu terasasu ākāresu ekekena
anya-e0103n11:129_1: dhātūnaṁ pariggaṇhanamukhena. Svāyanti so ayaṁ upacārasamādhi. Kathaṁ panassa vavatthānapariyāyoti
anya-e0103n11:130_0: 360. Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṁse dassetuṁ “idañca panā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Suññataṁ
anya-e0103n11:130_1: avagāhatīti dhātumattatādassanena rūpakāyassa anattakataṁ vavatthāpayato tadanusārena
anya-e0103n11:130_2: nāmakāyassāpi anattakatā supākaṭā hotīti sabbaso attasuññataṁ pariyogāhati tattha
anya-e0103n11:130_3: patiṭṭhahati. Sattasaññaṁ samugghātetīti tato eva “satto poso itthī puriso”ti evaṁ
anya-e0103n11:130_4: pavattaṁ ayāthāvasaññaṁ ugghāteti samūhanati. Vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṁ anāvajjamānoti
anya-e0103n11:130_5: sasantāne viya parasantānepi dhātumattatāya sudiṭṭhattā khīṇāsavo viya “ime sīhabyagghādayo
anya-e0103n11:130_6: vāḷamigā, ime yakkharakkhasā”ti evamādivikappaṁ akaronto bhayabheravaṁ sahati abhibhavati.
anya-e0103n11:130_7: Yathāvuttavikappanāpajjanaṁ hi bhayabheravasahanassa kāraṇaṁ vuttaṁ. Ugghāto uppilāvitattaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:130_8: Nigghāto dīnabhāvappatti. Mahāpañño ca pana hoti dhātuvasena kāye sammadeva ghanavinibbhogassa
anya-e0103n11:130_9: karaṇato. Tathā hidaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ buddhicaritassa anukūlanti vuttaṁ, sugatiparāyaṇo
anya-e0103n11:133_1: hi ñātassa pabhedo vuccamāno suviññeyyo hoti saṅkhepapubbakattā vitthārassa, vitthāravidhinā
anya-e0103n11:133_2: ca saṅkhepavidhi saṅgayhatīti “samādhissa vitthāraṁ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:133_3: Atha vā “ko samādhī”tiādināpi samādhisseva pakārabhedo dassīyati, bhāvanānisaṁsopi
anya-e0103n11:133_4: bhāvanānayanissito evāti adhippāyena “vitthāraṁ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:133_5: Sabbappakāratoti palibodhupacchedādikassa sabbassa bhāvanāya pubbakiccassa karaṇappakārato
anya-e0103n11:134_0: “Samattā hotī”ti vatvā tameva samattabhāvaṁ vibhāvetuṁ “duvidhoyevā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:134_1: Idha adhippeto samādhīti lokiyasamādhiṁ āha. Dasasu kammaṭṭhānesūti yāni heṭṭhā “upacārāvahānī”ti
anya-e0103n11:134_2: vuttāni dasa kammaṭṭhānāni, tesu. Appanāpubbabhāgacittesūti appanāya pubbabhāgacittesu
anya-e0103n11:134_3: aṭṭhannaṁ jhānānaṁ pubbabhāgacittuppādesu. Ekaggatāti ekāvajjanavīthiyaṁ, nānāvajjanavīthiyañca
anya-e0103n11:136_0: 362. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo, tattha sukhavihāro diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro.
anya-e0103n11:136_1: Kāmaṁ “samāpajjitvā”ti etena appanāsamādhiyeva vibhāvito, “ekaggacittā”ti pana padena
anya-e0103n11:136_2: upacārasamādhinopi gahaṇaṁ hotīti tato nivattanatthaṁ “appanāsamādhibhāvanā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n11:136_3: Na kho paneteti ete bāhirakabhāvitā jhānadhammā cittekaggatāmattakarā. Ariyassa vinaye
anya-e0103n11:136_4: buddhassa bhagavato sāsane “sallekhā”ti na vuccanti kilesānaṁ sallekhanapaṭipadā
anya-e0103n11:136_5: na hotīti katvā, sāsane pana avihiṁsādayopi sallekhāva lokuttarapādakattā.
anya-e0103n11:137_0: Sambādheti taṇhāsaṁkilesādinā saṁkiliṭṭhatāya paramasambādhe ativiya saṅkaṭaṭṭhānabhūte
anya-e0103n11:137_2: okāsassa adhigamanayena. Tassa hi dullabhatāya appanādhigamampi anadhigamayamāno
anya-e0103n11:137_3: saṁvegabahulo puggalo upacārasamādhimhiyeva ṭhatvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karoti “sīghaṁ
anya-e0103n11:138_1: ettha iti-saddo pakārattho, tena “iminā pakārena vuttanayā”ti sesābhiññānampi vuttappakāraṁ
anya-e0103n11:138_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Sati sati āyataneti purimabhavasiddhe abhiññādhigamassa kāraṇe vijjamāne.
anya-e0103n11:138_3: Abhiññādhigamassa hi adhikāro icchitabbo, yo “pubbahetū”ti vuccati. Na samāpattīsu
anya-e0103n11:138_4: vasībhāvo. Tenāha bhagavā “sati sati āyatane”ti. Abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassāti vakkhamānavibhāgāya
anya-e0103n11:138_5: abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sacchikātabbassa. Dhammassāti bhāvetabbassa ceva vibhāvetabbassa
anya-e0103n11:138_6: ca dhammassa. Abhiññāsacchikiriyāya cittaṁ abhininnāmetīti yojanā. Tatra tatrevāti
anya-e0103n11:138_7: tasmiṁ tasmiṁyeva sacchikātabbadhamme. Sakkhibhāvāya paccakkhakāritāya bhabbo sakkhibhabbo,
anya-e0103n11:139_0: Taṁ taṁ bhavagamikammaṁ ārabbha bhavapatthanāya anuppannāyapi kammassa katūpacitabhāveneva
anya-e0103n11:139_1: bhavapatthanākiccaṁ sijjhatīti dassento āha “apatthayamānā vā”ti. Saha byeti pavattatīti
anya-e0103n11:139_2: sahabyo, sahāyo, idha pana ekabhavūpago adhippeto, tassa bhāvo sahabyatā, taṁ sahabyataṁ.
anya-e0103n11:140: Kiṁ pana appanāsamādhibhāvanāyeva bhavavisesānisaṁsā, udāhu itarāpīti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha “upacārasamādhibhāvanāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n11:141_0: Nibbānanti tissannaṁ dukkhatānaṁ nibbutiṁ. Rūpadhamme pariyāpannā vijjamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā
anya-e0103n11:141_1: cittassa abhāvena asantasamāva. Tenāha “sukhaṁ viharissāmā”ti. Soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhīti
anya-e0103n11:141_3: aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhahi ca ariyamaggaphalañāṇehīti evaṁ soḷasahi. Navahi samādhicariyāhīti
anya-e0103n11:141_4: pañcannaṁ rūpajjhānānaṁ, catunnaṁ arūpajjhānānañca vasena evaṁ navahi. Keci pana
anya-e0103n11:142: Samādhibhāvanāyogeti samādhibhāvanāya anuyoge anuyuñjane, samādhibhāvanāsaṅkhāte vā yoge. Yogoti bhāvanā vuccati. Yathāha “yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī”ti.
